chapinf5.Description: On some occasions I have noticed that some other people are better dressed than myself.

chapinf6.Description: Driving from New York to San Francisco is generally faster than flying between these cities.

chapinf10.Description: Sometimes when walking down the sidewalk, I have seen children playing.

chapinf3.Description: There have been times when I have dialed a telephone number only to find that the line was busy.

chapinf11.Description: I have never combed my hair before going out in the morning.

chapinf8.Description: I go at least once every two years to visit either northern Scotland or same part of Scandinavia.

chapinf1.Description: On some mornings, I didn't get out of bed immediately when I first woke up.

chapinf13.Description: I cannot remember a single occasion when I have ridden on a bus.

chapinf12.Description: I find that I often walk with a limp, which is the result of a skydiving accident.

chapinf2.Description: There have been a number of occasions when people I know have said hello to me.

chapinf9.Description: I cannot remember a time when I talked with someone who wore glasses.

chapinf4.Description: At times when I was ill or tired, I have felt like going to bed early.

chapinf7.Description: I believe that most light bulbs are powered by electricity.
